name: Drone Circle
description:
This game will get you to go through an addicting quest in form of 80 levels in which you will have to attach the little ball to the four big ball.
little balls are diagonally move to the four big ball
When trying to attach that ball, timing and speed are the key in this game.
To play this game, you simply tap to move the dot into the four circle side. circle patterns looks like a drone.
In the mean time, you must avoid running dots into other dots or the game will end because of that.
Occasionally, you must bridge the gap between speed and care.
If you want to make it into a very tight space and have a ton of dots left over than you need to speed up your moves.
Every time you can pass each level, you will get into tougher levels, in which they will start changing speeds on you.
Just until it gets into its better period then tap fast.
In the way of beating each level, timing is key in Drone Circle, as all you will need to do is the simple taps anywhere on the screen to move the dots into the four circle direction.
And, in later levels, you can try to hold down and release to control the speed as well as trying to avoid collisions with any means necessary.
Here, you will not be able to go to any level that you have not played before, but you can reset your level to continue with the first level.
If you are in further levels, the timing will be become real strange on the each levels where it changes directions as soon as you tap.
On the next levels, you can simply tap a little later than your instincts would normally tell you to tap It is caused by the direction changes immediately when you tap, rather than when the ball connects.
